Modal window examples

Heads up! Modal window position has been overriden to be relative for demo purposes. Position is fixed by default.

Markup

The default rendering of a modal contains a header and footer.

In culpa reprehenderit reprehenderit quis

Cupidatat ad eu ullamco reprehenderit voluptate nisi occaecat cupidatat officia pariatur non do cupidatat nostrud anim commodo tempor velit ex ex labore nisi occaecat adipisicing minim consequat magna ea consequat 

<div tabindex="-1" role="dialog" class="wk-modal wk-modal-large">
  <section class="wk-modal-content">
    <header class="wk-modal-header">
      <h4 class="wk-modal-title">Dolore et ullamco tempor pariatur 
      </h4>
      <div tabIndex="0" aria-label="close dialog" class="wk-modal-close"><span class="wk-icon-close-empty"></span></div>
    </header>
    <div class="wk-modal-body">
      <p>Deserunt occaecat Lorem est pariatur culpa veniam exercitation cillum laboris laborum ipsum aliqua eu consectetur officia excepteur labore incididunt sint aliqua consectetur qui ullamco laborum proident irure exercitation velit consequat 
      </p>
    </div>
    <footer class="wk-modal-footer">
      <div class="wk-button-bar">
        <div class="wk-button-group-right">
          <button class="wk-button-secondary">Cancel</button>
          <button>Accept</button>
        </div>
      </div>
    </footer>
  </section>
</div>

With overlay

To draw the overlay just add the class .wk-modal-with-overlay in the same .wk-modal element.



<div id="overlay" tabindex="-1" role="dialog" class="wk-modal wk-modal-small wk-modal-with-overlay">
  <section class="wk-modal-content">
    <header class="wk-modal-header">
      <div class="wk-modal-title">Dolore dolor incididunt dolore ea 
      </div>
      <div onClick="javascript:closeModal(event)" tabIndex="0" aria-label="close dialog" class="wk-modal-close"><span class="wk-icon-close-empty"></span></div>
    </header>
    <div class="wk-modal-body">
      <p>Ad sint proident magna pariatur commodo sit nisi occaecat labore ut id esse commodo Lorem proident nulla duis pariatur ipsum exercitation officia non dolor officia esse fugiat dolor anim velit 
      </p>
    </div>
    <footer class="wk-modal-footer">
      <div class="wk-button-bar">
        <div class="wk-button-group-right">
          <button onClick="javascript:closeModal(event)" tabIndex="0" aria-label="close dialog" class="wk-button-secondary">Cancel</button>
          <button>Accept</button>
        </div>
      </div>
    </footer>
  </section>
</div>

Without header

A modal can also be used without a header, when needed.

Reprehenderit eu magna est nulla commodo qui do pariatur cillum minim Lorem exercitation occaecat consequat qui incididunt consequat nostrud magna pariatur id cupidatat nisi enim nostrud aliqua incididunt adipisicing ipsum ipsum voluptate magna qui amet esse non sunt adipisicing ut sunt voluptate ad adipisicing voluptate exercitation nostrud incididunt sunt aliquip 

<div tabindex="-1" role="dialog" class="wk-modal wk-modal-large">
  <section class="wk-modal-content">
    <div class="wk-modal-body">
      <p>Deserunt aliqua non qui duis occaecat culpa deserunt sunt ad ex magna reprehenderit sint laboris sit dolore dolor ad aliqua eiusmod laborum deserunt est est consequat eu cupidatat ullamco in occaecat minim reprehenderit irure ex pariatur excepteur quis ipsum incididunt et ea elit ut id Lorem non laborum labore aliqua 
      </p>
    </div>
    <footer class="wk-modal-footer">
      <div class="wk-button-bar">
        <div class="wk-button-group-right">
          <button class="wk-button-secondary">Cancel</button>
          <button>Accept</button>
        </div>
      </div>
    </footer>
  </section>
</div>
Qui magna cupidatat in officia

Aliquip incididunt veniam ullamco id eiusmod est laboris ullamco ex sint in incididunt amet veniam sint proident pariatur dolore anim sit eu deserunt enim nulla nostrud officia incididunt voluptate duis
